languages.text: {n}Мехадендриты Паскаля замирают, а оптический аугмент фокусируется на вас, пытаясь распознать реальность вашей угрозы.{/n}
{n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендриты Паскаля замирают, а оптический аугмент фокусируется на вас, пытаясь распознать реальность вашей угрозы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}
{n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}

{n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las mecadendritas de Pasqal se detienen y su aumento óptico se centra en ti, tratando de verificar si tu amenaza va en serio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mecadendritas de Pasqal se detienen y su aumento óptico se centra en ti, tratando de verificar si tu amenaza va en serio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルの機械触手が止まり、光学オーグメントがあなたに焦点を合わせ、あなたの脅威の真偽を確かめようとする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの機械触手が止まり、光学オーグメントがあなたに焦点を合わせ、あなたの脅威の真偽を確かめようとする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须一动不动，面甲植入物认认真真地盯着你，似乎想弄清楚你的威胁含有多少真意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须一动不动，面甲植入物认认真真地盯着你，似乎想弄清楚你的威胁含有多少真意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Mechadendriten erstarren und seine optische Augmentierung fokussiert sich auf dich, um die Authentizität deiner Drohung zu verifizieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Mechadendriten erstarren und seine optische Augmentierung fokussiert sich auf dich, um die Authentizität deiner Drohung zu verifizieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les mécadendrites de Pasqal se figent tandis que son augmentation optique vous observe avec intensité pour déterminer l'authenticité de votre menace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mécadendrites de Pasqal se figent tandis que son augmentation optique vous observe avec intensité pour déterminer l'authenticité de votre menace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritleri donakalıyor. Optik ogmenti sana odaklanarak tehdidinin hakikatini doğrulamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites freeze and the optical augment focuses on you, trying to verify the authenticity of your threat.{/n}
